snippet: Two high school football players in Steubenville, Ohio, face charges of raping a 16-year-old girl last summer in a case that has already played out online for months.
abstract: Trial commences for Trenton Mays and Ma'lik Richmond, two Steubenville, Ohio, high school football players accused of raping 16-year-old girl in 2012; attendees are forbidden from posting to social media while inside courtroom, precaution in case that has already played out online for months

byline.original: By ERICA GOODE and NATE SCHWEBER

lead_paragraph: Two high school football players in Steubenville, Ohio, face charges of raping a 16-year-old girl last summer in a case that has already played out online for months.

headline.seo: Steubenville Rape Case Heads to Trial
headline.main: Case Already Tried in Social Media Heads to Court
headline.print_headline: Case Already Tried Across Social Media Heads to Courtroom
